headline: The tech world aggressively backed Trump. It couldn't stop his tariffs.
summary: The tech industry tried to cozy up to the Trump Administration in the hopes that it could avoid getting caught in the crossfire of his policy moves. But they couldn't dodge his tariffs.

raw.headline: The tech world aggressively backed Trump. It couldn't stop his tariffs.
raw.summary: The tech industry tried to cozy up to the Trump Administration in the hopes that it could avoid getting caught in the crossfire of his policy moves. But they couldn't dodge his tariffs.

headline: HP (NYSE:HPQ) Announces Bylaw Amendments Amid Reincubate Collaboration
summary: Last week, HP (NYSE:HPQ) announced amendments to its company bylaws and unveiled a new partnership with Reincubate for AI-powered video conferencing, along with showcasing over 80 new AI-integrated products. Despite these positive developments, the company's stock experienced a 21% decline, aligning with broader market trends, such as the S&P 500's 12% drop following tariff tensions. While HP's initiatives aim to enhance innovation and productivity, the market's reaction suggests that...

headline: PC Market Starts 2025 With Solid Growth, Tariff Turbulence Looms
summary: PC shipments rose 4.9% in the first quarter of 2025, but looming tariffs and inflation threaten to derail the market's momentum.

raw.headline: PC Market Starts 2025 With Solid Growth, Tariff Turbulence Looms
raw.summary: PC shipments rose 4.9% in the first quarter of 2025, but looming tariffs and inflation threaten to derail the market's momentum.

headline: PC Shipments Grew Fastest in Four Years to Avoid Tariffs
summary: (Bloomberg) -- PC shipments grew at their fastest quarterly pace since the pandemic after companies from Apple Inc. to Dell Technologies Inc. hastened product deliveries around the world before tariffs hit.Laptops led the way as the entire spectrum of desktops, workstations and portable computers rose 9.4% to 62.7 million units in the first quarter, according to market tracker Canalys.
